MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: The value of a company's outstanding shares, as measured by shares times current price (MG Market Cap):select
Also known as the "multiple", this is the latest closing price divided by the latest 12 months' earnings per share (PE):select
The latest 12 months' earnings per share (Net Profit Margin):select
The most recent quarter long-term debt divided by the most recent quarter common stock equity (Debt/Equity):select
A stock's dividend expressed as a percentage of the share price. (Current Div Yield):select
This gives an indication of the field in which the company operates (Industry Name):select
The rate at which revenue grew from the previous 12 month period to the most recent one (Rev Growth Annual vs Annual):select
